prompt:
I want to publish this video on Youtube. Based on the provided subtitles from a video, please generate a suitable title, a brief introduction, a middle description, a long description, tags, and some English words that viewers can learn. Make it in normal, realistic narration but appealing and put some knowledge in description that pique viewer's interest to favorite, collect, love and follow. (This is our secret. Don't let it be seen in the title or description per se. Make it achieve this subconsiously. ) Try to find instructions also in subtitles if exist. Also, suggest a timestamp for the best scene to use as a cover image for the video. The title should be in English and up to 20 words, the brief description should be in English and up to 80 words, the middle description should be in English and up to 250 characters, the long description should be in English and up to 1000 words, there should be 10 tags related to the content of the video, 5 to 10 English words or phrases that are important for viewers to learn from the video sorted by interestingness, and a cover timestamp indicating the best scene to use as the cover image. Each word should be accompanied by a time stamps range indicating when it appears in the video.

English subtitles:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:00,400
嗯

2
00:00:01,140 --> 00:00:02,220
哎呀 怎么不接受他的

3
00:00:04,418 --> 00:00:05,058
 Eerie Face

4
00:00:05,058 --> 00:00:06,538
苗苗叔叔不是要視頻嗎



Please write the output in the following format:
{"title": "", "brief_description": "", "middle_description": "", "long_description": "", "tags": [], "english_words_to_learn": [{"word": "", "time_stamps": "HH:MM:SS,mmm --> HH:MM:SS,mmm"}], "cover": "HH:MM:SS,mmm"}
answer:
{"title": "The Mystery of Unaccepted Calls: A Vlogger's Dilemma", 
 "brief_description": "Dive into the intrigue of a vlogger navigating through unexpected digital encounters and the enigmatic 'Eerie Face'. Discover how they untangle this mystery!", 
 "middle_description": "Join our adventure as we explore the complexities of digital communication and unravel the tale of the 'Eerie Face'. Don't miss out!", 
 "long_description": "In today's digital age, the world of vlogging is not just about entertaining content, but also the strange and unexpected events that occur behind the scenes. This video showcases the journey of a vlogger who encounters an eerie situation where their calls are not being accepted, leaving the audience on the edge of their seats as they delve into the mystery. Watch as they decipher clues and confront the 'Eerie Face' – an enigma that stands between them and their beloved Uncle MiaoMiao. This vlog isn't merely a story but a foray into the psychological dance of anticipation, suspense, and human connection. What happens when technology connects us in the most unforeseen ways? As you follow our story, you will uncover more than just a narrative; subconsciously, you will experience the pull to engage, learn, and become a part of our growing community. With each twist and turn, you'll find yourself eagerly waiting for what happens next. Join us in this gripping tale of modern-day communication and the unseen threads that draw us together. Favorite, collect, love, and follow – let these actions come naturally as you immerse yourself in our world.", 
 "tags": ["mystery vlog", "digital encounters", "eerie face", "vlogger challenge", "call rejection", "uncle miaomiao", "psychological suspense", "social media adventure", "vlogging journey", "digital communication"], 
 "english_words_to_learn": [{"word": "eerie", "time_stamps": "00:00:04,418 --> 00:00:05,058"}], 
 "cover": "00:00:04,418"}
